cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

#project(uuid)
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fPIC ")
# Define some variables
set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lua_c_modules/bin/linux)
set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lua_c_modules/bin/linux)

#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
	${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lua-uuid/src/
	${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lua51/src
)

# Compiler options
add_definitions(-DUNIX64 -DLINUX)

# Linker options
#set(LINK_OPTIONS -O2)

link_directories(
	${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lua_c_modules/bin/linux
)

if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
# set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. -LE:/CQProject/GIS_Platform/DataImport/x64/release/ ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lua-uuid/src/luauuid.cpp
)

#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -std=c++11")
	
add_library(luauuid SHARED ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(luauuid
	lua
	uuid
)
